006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IMutableConfiguration;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModuleLoader;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext.IModuleLoaderStrategy;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.SimpleModuleLoaderStrategy;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.codegen.DefaultModuleBindingGenerator;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.DeserializationFeature;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017
018/**
019 * Supports loading a Metaschema module from a specified resource.
020 * <p>
021 * Metaschema modules loaded this way are automatically registered with the
022 * {@link IBindingContext}.
023 * <p>
024 * Use of this Metaschema module loader requires that the associated binding
025 * context is initialized using a {@link IModuleLoaderStrategy} that supports
026 * dynamic bound module loading. This can be accomplished using the
027 * {@link SimpleModuleLoaderStrategy} initialized using the
028 * {@link DefaultModuleBindingGenerator}.
029 *
030 */
031public interface IBindingModuleLoader
032    extends IModuleLoader<IBindingMetaschemaModule>, IMutableConfiguration<DeserializationFeature<?>> {
033  /**
034   * Get the associated binding context.
035   *
036   * @return the binding context
037   */
038  @NonNull
039  IBindingContext getBindingContext();
040
041  /**
042   * Enable entity resolution within a loaded Metaschema module resource.
043   */
044  default void allowEntityResolution() {
045    enableFeature(DeserializationFeature.DESERIALIZE_XML_ALLOW_ENTITY_RESOLUTION);
046  }
047}
